meanings.definition: To engage in the act of tomming, typically referring to a male cat spraying to mark territory.
meanings.sent1: The cat was tomming around the neighborhood to show other cats it was his territory.
meanings.sent2: She saw a stray cat tomming on her garden fence.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten was caught tomming on the new sofa.
meanings.sent4: The graffiti artist tommed the wall with colorful spray paint.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of tomming lingered in the air, warning other cats to stay away.

meanings.definition: The act of participating in tomming, often used in a derogatory manner to describe someone behaving in a reckless or aggressive manner.
meanings.sent1: His constant tomming at the party annoyed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The tomming of the bullies led to a fight in the schoolyard.
meanings.sent3: Her friends teased her for her tomming during the game.
meanings.sent4: The tomming of the toddler caused chaos in the playground.
meanings.sent5: The tomming of the driver on the road made other drivers nervous.
